languages.text: "Я немедленно отправлюсь на корабль. Если вам что-то понадобится — я буду на своем обычном месте на мостике".
"I will head to the ship at once. If you need anything, you can find me at my usual post on the bridge."
languages.original_text: "Я немедленно отправлюсь на корабль. Если вам что-то понадобится — я буду на своем обычном месте на мостике".

traits.locale_text: "I will head to the ship at once. If you need anything, you can find me at my usual post on the bridge."
"I will head to the ship at once. If you need anything, you can find me at my usual post on the bridge."

"I will head to the ship at once. If you need anything, you can find me at my usual post on the bridge."
"I will head to the ship at once. If you need anything, you can find me at my usual post on the bridge."

languages.text: 「すぐに船へ向かいます。何かあれば、いつものようにブリッジの持ち場にいますので、呼んでください」
languages.original_text: "I will head to the ship at once. If you need anything, you can find me at my usual post on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: 「すぐに船へ向かいます。何かあれば、いつものようにブリッジの持ち場にいますので、呼んでください」

languages.text: "Derhâl gemiye doğru yola koyuluyorum. Bir ihtiyacınız olursa beni köprüde, her zamanki yerimde bulabilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "I will head to the ship at once. If you need anything, you can find me at my usual post on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: "Derhâl gemiye doğru yola koyuluyorum. Bir ihtiyacınız olursa beni köprüde, her zamanki yerimde bulabilirsiniz."

languages.text: «Iré a la nave de inmediato. Si necesita cualquier cosa, estaré en mi puesto habitual en el puente».
languages.original_text: "I will head to the ship at once. If you need anything, you can find me at my usual post on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: «Iré a la nave de inmediato. Si necesita cualquier cosa, estaré en mi puesto habitual en el puente».

languages.text: “我马上就到船上去。如果你需要什么，可以去舰桥我平时的位置找我。”
languages.original_text: "I will head to the ship at once. If you need anything, you can find me at my usual post on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: “我马上就到船上去。如果你需要什么，可以去舰桥我平时的位置找我。”

languages.text: « Je regagne le vaisseau de ce pas. Si vous avez besoin de quoi que ce soit, vous me trouverez à mon poste habituel sur la passerelle. »
languages.original_text: "I will head to the ship at once. If you need anything, you can find me at my usual post on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: « Je regagne le vaisseau de ce pas. Si vous avez besoin de quoi que ce soit, vous me trouverez à mon poste habituel sur la passerelle. »

languages.text: "Ich mache mich sofort auf den Weg zum Schiff. Falls Ihr etwas braucht, findet Ihr mich an meinem gewohnten Posten auf der Brücke."
languages.original_text: "I will head to the ship at once. If you need anything, you can find me at my usual post on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: "Ich mache mich sofort auf den Weg zum Schiff. Falls Ihr etwas braucht, findet Ihr mich an meinem gewohnten Posten auf der Brücke."
